author: tgannon
title: Robin van Persie blasted by stunning Besiktas Wag after his theatrics gets her husband sent off
text:
'Stupid motherf ' Robin van Persie blasted by stunning Besiktas Wag after his theatrics gets her husband sent off 
Former Manchester United star also lost a friend in ex-Arsenal ace Oguzhan Ozyakup for his sliding celebrations By TOBY GANNON Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments ROBIN VAN PERSIE was called a ‚Äústupid motherf ‚Äù by a furious Wag after a theatrical dive got her husband sent off. 
The Dutchman scored a scored a second-half winner to see Fenerbahce beat Besiktas in a heated Tukish Cup derby on Sunday. Getty Images 3 Robin van Persie was branded a ‚Äòstupid motherf ‚Äô for his theatrics during the Fenerbahce-Besiktas derby 
But first, he was involved in an off-the-ball incident which saw Serb defender Dusko Tosic shown a red card. 
Keep up to date with ALL the latest football news, gossip and rumours 
Van Persie appeared to knee Tosic in the ribs and grab his head while they tangled for the ball. 
The Besiktas star was then given his marching orders for his reaction on Van Persie, when the former Manchester United striker comically dived to the floor. 
After the match, Tosic‚Äôs wife, Jelena Kerleusa tweeted: ‚ÄúR. van Persie is one stupid motherf . Brake [sic] a leg a**hole!‚Äù She later deleted the tweet after being asked to by her husband. 
She added: ‚ÄúDusko asked me to remove my tweet about Persie, and I did. What can I say, I don‚Äôt like dirty players. Kisses to all Besiktas fans!‚Äù Twitter@karleusastar 3 
Dusko asked me to remove my tweet about Persie, and I did. What can I say, I don't like dirty players. Kisses to all Besiktas fans! A photo posted by JELENA KARLEU≈†A (@karleusastar) on Dec 16, 2016 at 12:51pm PST 
‚Äî Jelena Karleu≈°a (@karleusastar) January 30, 2017 Kill 'em with kindness, success, great style and big beautiful natural ASS;-) pic.twitter.com/YfZc8pqI5G 
‚Äî Jelena Karleu≈°a (@karleusastar) January 19, 2017 üë©üèº A photo posted by JELENA KARLEU≈†A (@karleusastar) on Feb 5, 2017 at 1:09pm PST üì∏ A photo posted by JELENA KARLEU≈†A (@karleusastar) on Jan 31, 2017 at 1:57pm PST Related Stories SAMBA BOYS Ex-Manchester United and Arsenal striker Robin van Persie could join Didier Drogba by joining Sao Paulo in Brazil Chip off the old block Shaqueel van Persie looks like he's inherited his dad's skills after posting a video of him playing in the snow ROCKIN' ROBIN Robin 'looked like a boxer' says van Persie's relieved wife Bouchra as she posts injury update s-mart move Anthony Martial to quit Manchester United for PSG this summer after 'falling out with Jose Mourinho' pep on call Gabriel Jesus moved to Manchester City because Pep Guardiola was only manager to personally call him 
Van Persie also lost a friend in former Arsenal team-mate Oguzhan Ozyakup during the derby. 
The 33-year-old slid in front of the Besiktas captain to celebrate his winning goal. 
Ozyakup said: ‚ÄúI have a lot to say about the incidents on the field. But I won‚Äôt say them. Getty Images 3 Robin van Persie ran to celebrate in front of former Arsenal team-mate Oguzhan Ozyakup 
‚ÄúJust one thing ‚Äì I was very good friends with a certain player on the field. That changed today. Sometimes you see the real face of a footballer on the field.‚Äù 
The Besiktas midfielder, 24, played in Arsenal‚Äôs academy between 2008 and 2012 before making a few senior appearances for the club. 
Van Persie helped the Turk ‚Äì who was born in Holland ‚Äì settle after his move from AZ Alkmaar. Watch Fenerbahce star Robin Van Persie in a nasty clash of heads
